mapper.select: select name, diameter, width, height, type, price from tires inner join car_type on car_type.id = tires.car_type_id where car_type_id = 2
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO tires (name, price, diameter, width, height, type, car_type_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{diameter}, #{width}, #{height}, #{type}, 2)
INSERT IGNORE INTO car_type (id, car_type) VALUES (2, #{car_type})
